body: @YourSenpai thanks for telling me. I didn't notice that
@don'tknowwhyimhere  This is not a simple re-upload but the Decensored version of #173172

This is a re-upload, but since it's not so common to see re-uploads of this author, i think we can let it pass. Also his art and are story are enjoyable. He's does a nice job in making a fun harem route doujin for to love ru, he does a good job in using the characters original personality and traits to create erotic situations and sex scenes. Like Lala is super innocent and lovely, Sairenji is bashful, but ready to try and get close to Rito, Momo likes and admires Rito and wants to turn him into a harem master
